title: English to Hindi Dictionary
description:
English to Hindi Dictionary and Hindi to English Dictionary(हिन्दी शब्दकोश) a quick bilingual reference/guide works with meanings available for all English and Hindi words. Designed by passionate UI developers.
Smartly designed light weight app works offline and gives faster results without any hassle.
Features:
-Advanced UI Design
-Synonyms & Antonyms (brand new collection)
-Word usage example (new feature)
-Word suggest, type ahead search
-Offline
-Recent & Favourite words
-Word of the day
-Online search
-Lovely interface
-Fastest hindi dictionary in the android market
-Elegant and simple UI for faster results
-Top performing app in India
